Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

package it.polimi.ingsw.client
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActionHandler
    client-side Controller of player's actions, dispatch actions to methods (CLI-only)
    ClientModel
    Class ClientModel is a simplified model which the client sees
    CliView
    implementation of the View interface for the CLI
    EventsHandler
    Handles Server incoming Events and dispatch actions, it uses VISITOR PATTERN
    EventsHandlerCLI
    Implementation of ServerEventObserver interface, used for CLI only, to show messages based on received events (like the virtual view, or in the client)
    ServerHandler
    Class ServerHandler handles messages from server to client and viceversa (serverHandler)
